room_title: Escape room "The N-Virus" by Saginaw Escape in Saginaw
room_description:
You and your group thought you were getting a tour of a top-secret government lab facility. Guess again, the facility needs human research subjects for the deadly N-Virus. And guess what, you just volunteered.
Use the clues left behind by one of the scientists that is on your side to solve the puzzles and find the antidote before it is too late. You and your group only have 60 minutes until the virus takes over your mind. Be fast and be smart, your life depends on it!
